dc:title: On Pilgrimage - April 1948
dc:author: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Meditation on love--our need for love, God's lavish and foolish love, how hard love can be, how others will disapprove of loving the poor, even Lenin and Marx. Urges readers to come to a retreat at Newburgh for renewal and refreshment. Welcomes the Spring warmth and Peter Maurin's coming to the farm.
